chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 13 Pro has a problem:
The condition of the iPhone ordered does not match that of the received iPhone. The received iPhone shows cracks on the glass that catch under the nail and are visible at more than 20cm.
This is not the iPhone I wanted to order.
I am requesting a refund.
Best regards,
Géraldine Bierlein

Thank you for your help,

Dear Backcare,

We have refunded the customer. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

Regards,
AS
